title: Chapter 10 - ISP: The Interface Segregation Principle

cells.data:
Simple principle here - don't depend on interfaces you don't need. Example moving from:

![IMAGE](quiver-image-url/DA237158129E4B2AD981F0601AB69843.jpg =250x142)

to:

![IMAGE](quiver-image-url/67AF8A47241E8F09B828B16C01157F01.jpg =209x142)

That way, individual users only depend on code they actually use, and aren't forced into recompiles, redeploys, or (worst case) cascading failures based on a break in a component you don't even use!
